description: Embrace nature's cardiovascular protector with our premium Garlic Supplement. Standardized for optimal potency, garlic has been scientifically shown to support healthy cholesterol levels and blood pressure. Get all the heart-health benefits without the odor or digestive concerns.
ingredients: Fresh garlic cloves (10-12), honey (1 cup), glass jar with lid
instructions: 1. Peel and lightly crush garlic cloves. 2. Place in clean jar. 3. Cover completely with raw honey. 4. Seal and store in dark place. 5. Let ferment 3-4 weeks, burping jar daily. 6. Strain or leave cloves in honey.
notes: Raw garlic is most potent. Fermented garlic honey has additional probiotic benefits
dosage: 1-2 cloves daily or 1 tablespoon fermented garlic honey
caution: May increase bleeding risk. Avoid before surgery. Can interact with blood thinners. May cause stomach upset or heartburn.

description: Strengthen your heart naturally with our Hawthorn Berry Tea or Tincture. Revered for centuries as a cardiac tonic, hawthorn gently enhances heart muscle function, supports healthy blood pressure, and promotes efficient circulation. Available in both soothing tea and concentrated tincture forms.
ingredients: Dried hawthorn berries (2 tbsp) OR hawthorn leaves/flowers (1 tbsp), hot water (1 cup) for tea. For tincture: dried berries (1 cup), vodka 80-proof (2 cups), glass jar
instructions: TEA: 1. Add hawthorn to hot water. 2. Steep 10-15 minutes covered. 3. Strain and drink. TINCTURE: 1. Place berries in jar. 2. Cover with vodka. 3. Seal and shake daily. 4. Steep 4-6 weeks in dark place. 5. Strain through cheesecloth.
notes: Berries, leaves, and flowers all have cardiovascular benefits. Tincture is more concentrated
dosage: Tea: 1-2 cups daily. Tincture: 30-60 drops (1-2 ml) 2-3 times daily
caution: May interact with heart medications (especially digoxin, beta-blockers, calcium channel blockers). Consult doctor if on cardiac medications. Effects build gradually over weeks.

description: Reduce inflammation and support cardiovascular wellness with our Golden Turmeric Paste. This traditional preparation delivers curcumin's powerful anti-inflammatory benefits in a bioavailable form. Enhanced with black pepper for optimal absorption, it's nature's golden gift to your heart and circulation.
ingredients: Turmeric powder (1/2 cup), water (1 cup), black pepper (1.5 tsp), coconut oil (1/4 cup)
instructions: 1. Mix turmeric and water in small pot. 2. Heat on low, stirring constantly 7-10 minutes until thick paste forms. 3. Remove from heat. 4. Add black pepper and coconut oil. 5. Mix well. 6. Store in glass jar in fridge. Use in golden milk, smoothies, or take directly.
notes: Black pepper increases curcumin absorption by 2000%. Store in refrigerator up to 2 weeks
dosage: 1/2 to 1 teaspoon daily mixed in warm milk or water
caution: May increase bleeding risk. High doses can cause digestive upset. Avoid if you have gallstones. May interact with blood thinners and diabetes medications.

description: Nourish your heart with plant-based omega power. Our cold-pressed Flax Oil provides essential omega-3 fatty acids (ALA) that support cardiovascular function, healthy cholesterol balance, and flexible blood vessels. A pure, vegan source of heart-protective essential fats.
ingredients: Fresh flaxseeds (whole or ground), or cold-pressed flax oil
instructions: GROUND FLAX: 1. Grind whole flaxseeds in coffee grinder. 2. Store in airtight container in fridge up to 1 week. 3. Add to smoothies, oatmeal, or yogurt. FLAX OIL: Use cold-pressed oil, never heat. Add to smoothies or take directly.
notes: Flaxseeds must be ground to absorb omega-3s. Store in refrigerator to prevent rancidity
dosage: 1-2 tablespoons ground flaxseed daily OR 1 tablespoon flax oil daily
caution: May have mild laxative effect. Can interact with blood thinners. Contains phytoestrogens - consult doctor if hormone-sensitive conditions.

description: Sip your way to better heart health with our premium Green Tea Infusion. Rich in catechins and powerful antioxidants, green tea supports healthy cholesterol levels, protects blood vessels from oxidative stress, and promotes overall cardiovascular wellness. Ancient wisdom in every cup.
ingredients: Green tea leaves or bags (1-2 tsp loose leaf or 1 bag), hot water (8 oz, not boiling - 160-180Â°F)
instructions: 1. Heat water to 160-180Â°F (just before boiling). 2. Add green tea to water. 3. Steep 2-3 minutes (longer = more bitter). 4. Remove tea bag/strain leaves. 5. Drink plain or with small amount of honey.
notes: Avoid boiling water which destroys beneficial compounds. Sencha and matcha varieties highest in antioxidants
caution: Contains caffeine (25-50mg per cup) - limit if sensitive or anxious. Can reduce iron absorption - drink between meals. May interact with blood thinners and certain medications.

description: Experience the time-honored benefits with our carefully crafted herbal tea. This traditional remedy has been trusted for generations to promote healthy blood vessel function and support optimal circulation throughout the body. Each cup delivers nature's gentle support for vascular wellness.
ingredients: 1-2 teaspoons dried butcher's broom root (Ruscus aculeatus), 1 cup boiling water
instructions: 1. Boil 1 cup water. 2. Measure 1-2 tsp dried butcher's broom root. 3. Place herbs in cup. 4. Pour boiling water over herbs. 5. Cover and steep 10-15 minutes. 6. Strain to remove solids. 7. Add honey if desired. 8. Serve and enjoy.
notes: Contains ruscogenins that may strengthen blood vessels and reduce symptoms of poor circulation (varicose veins, swollen legs). Tea has slightly bitter taste - sweetening optional.
dosage: 1 cup daily in morning or evening. Start with 1 teaspoon and increase to 2 if desired.
caution: Consult healthcare professional before use. Not recommended during pregnancy or breastfeeding. May interact with blood pressure medications.

description: Harness the powerful synergy of two kitchen superfoods with our Garlic and Lemon Tonic. This potent natural remedy combines garlic's renowned cholesterol-lowering properties with lemon's abundant antioxidants to support your cardiovascular health. A daily dose of heart-smart nutrition from nature's pharmacy.
ingredients: 4-5 cloves fresh garlic, 1 organic lemon, 1 tablespoon raw honey (optional), 1 cup filtered water
instructions: 1. Peel and crush 4-5 garlic cloves, let sit 10 minutes. 2. Wash and grate lemon zest, then juice lemon. 3. Boil 1 cup water, remove from heat, cool 2 minutes. 4. Add crushed garlic and lemon to glass, pour hot water over. 5. Squeeze in lemon juice. 6. Add honey if desired. 7. Stir well and steep 5-10 minutes. 8. Strain and serve.
notes: Garlic contains allicin which helps lower LDL cholesterol. Lemons rich in vitamin C and antioxidants. Monitor cholesterol levels with healthcare provider guidance.
dosage: One cup daily, ideally in the morning on empty stomach.
caution: May cause digestive discomfort or heartburn. Reduce garlic if issues occur. Consult doctor if on blood-thinning medications or have bleeding disorder.

description: Fuel your circulation with our vibrant Beetroot and Aronia Juice blend. Packed with essential nutrients and natural nitrates, this delicious juice supports healthy blood flow and vascular function. Rich in antioxidants, it's a nutritious way to nourish your circulatory system from within.
ingredients: 1 medium beetroot (peeled, chopped), 1/2 cup aronia berries (fresh or frozen), 1/2 cup water, 1-2 tbsp honey (optional)
instructions: 1. Wash, peel, and chop beetroot into small pieces. 2. Place beetroot, aronia berries, and water in blender. 3. Blend until smooth. 4. Taste and add honey if desired, blend briefly. 5. Strain through fine-mesh strainer into glass. 6. Serve immediately or refrigerate up to 3 days. 7. Enjoy.
notes: Beets rich in folate and nitrates which convert to nitric oxide, helping relax blood vessels. Aronia supports heart health and plaque management. Can stain surfaces.
dosage: 1/2 to 1 cup (120-240 ml) per serving for circulatory health benefits.
caution: Can stain surfaces and clothing. May cause stomach upset in some people. If on blood pressure medications, consult healthcare provider as this may enhance effects.

description: Warm and invigorate your body with our Warming Turmeric and Cayenne Balm. This topical treatment combines the anti-inflammatory power of turmeric with cayenne's circulation-boosting heat to promote blood flow and provide soothing warmth to targeted areas. Perfect for external massage and comfort.
ingredients: 1/2 tsp turmeric powder, 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper powder, 1/4 tsp black pepper powder, 3 tbsp coconut oil, 0.2 oz (6g) beeswax
instructions: 1. Create double boiler with 1 inch water in saucepan. 2. Place heat-safe bowl on top, add coconut oil and beeswax. 3. Heat until beeswax melts (5 min), stir occasionally. 4. Add turmeric, cayenne, black pepper, stir well. 5. Heat 2-3 more minutes. 6. Remove from heat, let cool slowly, stir constantly. 7. Pour into clean glass jar. 8. Let cool and solidify (few hours). 9. Seal with lid.
notes: Capsaicin increases blood flow, turmeric anti-inflammatory, coconut oil hydrates. Will stain skin. Do NOT apply to open wounds or contact eyes.
dosage: Apply small amount to sore areas as needed. Massage onto muscles or joints to promote circulation.
caution: Do NOT apply to open wounds - causes sharp stinging. Avoid eyes and mucous membranes. Will stain skin - use oil then soap to remove. Test small area first. Not for children or sensitive skin.

description: Support your arterial wellness with our traditional Arterial De-Clogger Tea blend. This carefully formulated herbal tea combines time-tested botanicals known for their cardiovascular benefits. Designed to complement a heart-healthy lifestyle and support natural cholesterol management.
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, 2 inches ginger root, 1 x 2-inch cinnamon stick, 1/2 lemon (wedges), 1.5 cups water, Honey (optional)
instructions: 1. Peel and crush garlic, set aside 10 minutes. 2. Chop ginger into small pieces. 3. Bring 1.5 cups water to boil. 4. Add ginger, garlic, and cinnamon to boiling water. 5. Continue boiling until reduced to 1 cup. 6. Add lemon wedges, turn off heat. 7. Cover and steep 5 minutes. 8. Strain to remove solids. 9. Add honey if desired, stir until dissolved.
notes: Garlic and ginger assist cholesterol management. Cinnamon supports blood pressure. Lemon provides vitamin C for heart health. Garlic thins blood - caution with medications.
dosage: One cup daily on empty stomach for 7 days for arterial health benefits.
caution: Garlic thins blood - caution with blood-thinning medications, consult provider. Ginger may interact with blood thinners and diabetes medications. Not for pregnant/breastfeeding without supervision.

description: Nourish your heart with our Heart Harmony Elixir, a gentle yet powerful herbal blend. Featuring heart-strengthening hawthorn berries and vitamin C-rich rose hips, this elixir provides comprehensive support for cardiovascular wellness. A loving tonic for your most vital organ.
ingredients: 1 tbsp dried hawthorn berries, 1 tsp dried rose hips, 2 cups filtered water, Honey or maple syrup (optional), Fresh lemon slices (optional)
instructions: 1. Bring 2 cups water to boil. 2. Add hawthorn berries and rose hips to boiling water. 3. Reduce heat to low, cover, simmer 10-15 minutes. 4. Strain tea into cup using fine mesh strainer, press herbs to extract liquid. 5. Add honey or maple syrup if desired. 6. Garnish with lemon slice if desired. 7. Enjoy warm.
notes: Hawthorn used for centuries for cardiovascular health. Rose hips rich in vitamin C and antioxidants. Excessive consumption may cause digestive discomfort.
dosage: 1 to 2 cups daily for heart health support.
caution: Rose hips excessive consumption may cause digestive discomfort. Consult healthcare professional if on medications or have health conditions. May interact with heart medications.

description: Discover concentrated heart support with our Bilberry Heart-Drops. This premium alcohol-based tincture captures the cardiovascular benefits of wild bilberries in a convenient, fast-absorbing format. Rich in anthocyanins and antioxidants for optimal heart health maintenance.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh or frozen bilberries, 1 cup high-proof vodka or brandy (at least 80 proof)
instructions: 1. Rinse fresh bilberries and air dry (or thaw frozen berries). 2. Place bilberries in clean glass jar, gently mash with spoon. 3. Pour vodka or brandy over berries until completely submerged. 4. Seal jar tightly. 5. Shake well, store in cool dark place 4-6 weeks. 6. Shake jar gently every few days. 7. After 4-6 weeks, strain through fine-mesh strainer into clean glass bottle. 8. Label with contents and date. 9. Store in cool, dark place.
notes: Bilberries closely related to blueberries, known for heart-health benefits. Can use European bilberries or huckleberries. Contains alcohol.
caution: Contains alcohol. Consult healthcare provider before use, especially if on medications. Not recommended during pregnancy or breastfeeding without medical supervision.

description: Revitalize your cardiovascular system with our Young Heart Elixir. This comprehensive multi-herb tonic masterfully blends hawthorn, turmeric, ginger, and garlic to provide all-around heart support. Each ingredient works synergistically to promote vitality, circulation, and long-term cardiac wellness.
ingredients: 1 tbsp dried hawthorn berries, 1 inch fresh turmeric or 1/2 tsp powder, 1 inch fresh ginger or 1/2 tsp powder, 1-2 cloves garlic, Juice of 1/2 lemon, Pinch cayenne pepper (optional), 1-2 tsp honey (optional), 1 cup water
instructions: 1. If using fresh turmeric and ginger, peel and thinly slice. 2. Bring 1 cup water to boil. 3. Add hawthorn berries, turmeric, ginger, and garlic to boiling water. 4. Reduce heat to low, cover, simmer 15-20 minutes. 5. Strain into cup to remove solids. 6. Squeeze in juice of half lemon, stir. 7. Add pinch cayenne if desired. 8. Add honey if desired (1-2 tsp). 9. Mix well and enjoy warm. 10. Store leftovers in fridge 1-2 days.
notes: Combines hawthorn heart-protection with anti-inflammatory turmeric and ginger. Garlic supports blood pressure. Start small and increase gradually.
dosage: One cup daily, preferably in morning on empty stomach.
caution: Start with small serving, increase gradually. Consider periodic breaks for extended use. May interact with blood thinners and heart medications.

description: Find soothing relief with our Horse Chestnut Cooling Gel, specially formulated for varicose vein care. This refreshing topical treatment combines horse chestnut extract with calming witch hazel and aloe vera to reduce the appearance of spider veins, provide cooling comfort, and support vein health.
ingredients: 1/4 cup dried horse chestnut seeds or 1/2 cup fresh, 1 cup witch hazel extract, 1/4 cup aloe vera gel, 10-15 drops lavender oil (optional)
instructions: 1. If using fresh chestnuts, peel and finely chop. If dried, grind into fine powder. 2. Place powder/chopped chestnuts in glass jar. 3. Pour witch hazel over chestnuts until fully submerged. 4. Seal jar, shake well. 5. Store in cool, dark place 2 weeks, shake daily. 6. After 2 weeks, strain through cheesecloth into clean container. 7. In clean bowl, mix strained liquid with aloe vera gel. 8. Add 10-15 drops lavender oil if desired, stir well. 9. Pour into clean glass jar with lid. 10. Store in cool, dry place (fridge optional for cooling effect).
notes: Horse chestnut contains aescin (16-20%) for circulation support. Do not confuse with California or Ohio buckeye - different plants. Can take 300mg orally if esculin removed.
dosage: Apply to varicose veins by gently massaging into affected areas as needed. Avoid excessive use.
caution: Do not confuse with California or Ohio buckeye. For topical use only unless using esculin-free extract orally. Test on small area first. Consult healthcare provider before use.
